svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2021-01-28T20:48:46.140Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_7) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/14.0 Safari/605.1.15" etag="WS13fFzGdPe1FvAygoqy" version="14.1.8" type="device" pages="2"><diagram id="Hi5DJu9hpjOhU4L-1nYH" name="SCAPv2 Manager"></diagram><diagram id="4fspmggJXFJr2Ga4a_sT" name="SCAPv2 Collector"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 618px; height: 1px; padding-top: 642px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 421px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: Receives collection instructions from the Manager, and either engages a posture collection engine or an extension to perform collection.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: An "add-on" to a posture collection service, the PCX allows for extended collection capabilities.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 530px; margin-left: 421px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font: A component capable of directly collecting information about enterprise assets.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 78px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
color: rgb(255 , 255 , 255) ; font-size: 12px
color: rgb(255 , 255 , 255) ; font-size: 8px
div.font: A persistent storage component capable of recording previously collected information and retrieving that information when requested

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 421px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #ffffff; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: The manager is responsible for receiving instructions from applications, identifying and invoking collection components, and persisting collected posture attributes to a repository.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 324px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #404040; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
Reads from and writes to
[OpenDXL Ontology]
